issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

2 ways to see it...

Local Video test case show spinner that won't dismiss on clean install/first launch
1.install a new version of KS or KS-ipad onto the relevant device
2.go to the video tests and kick off a video (iphone - Phone>Play Movie>Local. iPad - Open Main tests>Embedded video
3.play and watch the video spinner

results: I can reliably repro a spinner that never goes away with local video, but its seems to be first launch only.

4g - Record Movie - spinner occurs on first record playback

1.Phone>Record Video
2.record a short, video, play it back

results: first time you do this test, there will be an endless spinner showed on the video. Subsequent tests do not show this behavior, only the first one.

{html}
fields.summary: Loading spinners not dismissed for video - first launch

comments.body:
{html}

For Thom:

This may actually be a duplicate of #1988. If you can confirm that the fix for #1988 also fixed this, then please mark this bug as duplicate. Otherwise, reassign to me.

{html}

{html}

unable to repro, closing. iPod 4th gen (4.1), ipad 3.2.2 with mobile sdk build 1.5.0.62c1cae

{html}
